thread.title: XCharge North America launches DC fast-charging station with solar and battery storage in Oregon, US
thread.title_full: XCharge North America launches DC fast-charging station with solar and battery storage in Oregon, US

title: XCharge North America launches DC fast-charging station with solar and battery storage in Oregon, US
text:
XCharge North America launches DC fast-charging station with solar and battery storage in Oregon, US
The GridLink chargers will enhance EV charging at Arrowhead Travel Plaza, integrating solar power and storage for sustainable energy solutions
XCharge North America, a subsidiary of XCHG Ltd., and provider of high-power electric vehicle charging solutions, announced a partnership with Arrowhead Travel Plaza at Wildhorse Resort & Casino in Pendleton, Oregon.
